description:
Nahar Eau Du Parfum - A Luxurious Oriental Fragrance Experience

Discover the captivating allure of Nahar Eau Du Parfum, a mesmerizing oriental fragrance that embodies the essence of Middle Eastern perfumery tradition with contemporary sophistication. This exquisite 100ML masterpiece creates an unforgettable olfactory journey that lingers beautifully throughout the day. âœ¨

The Essence of Nahar Perfume

Nahar translates to "daytime" in Arabic, perfectly capturing the bright yet complex character of this Arabic perfume. The fragrance opens with vibrant citrus notes that gradually unfold into a rich heart of exotic spices and floral accords. The base reveals a luxurious foundation of oud, amber, and musk that creates a warm, enveloping sensation. ðŸŒ¸

Product Information
Size 100ML
Gender Unisex
Product Type Eau Du Parfum
Concentration Eau de Parfum
Brand Nahar

Exquisite Fragrance Notes of Nahar

Fragrance Composition
Top Notes Bergamot, Saffron, Pink Pepper
Heart Notes Rose, Jasmine, Cardamom, Cinnamon
Base Notes Oud, Amber, Musk, Vanilla, Sandalwood

Key Features of Nahar Eau Du Parfum

  • ðŸ”¥ Long-lasting projection with exceptional sillage
  • ðŸ’Ž Elegant, luxurious bottle design that enhances any collection
  • ðŸŒ¿ Crafted with premium natural ingredients
  • ðŸ’« Versatile for both daytime elegance and evening sophistication
  • âœ¨ Perfect balance between traditional Arabic perfumery and modern sensibilities

Nahar fragrance represents the pinnacle of oriental perfumery, drawing inspiration from the rich heritage of Middle Eastern scent traditions. Created by master perfumers who understand the delicate art of balancing potent notes, this luxury fragrance offers an experience that transcends ordinary perfumery. The house behind Nahar has dedicated years to perfecting this composition, resulting in a scent that has quickly become a signature choice for discerning fragrance enthusiasts.

Frequently Asked Question

How long does Nahar Eau Du Parfum last on skin?
Nahar Eau Du Parfum is formulated with a high concentration of essential oils (15-20%), allowing it to last 8-10 hours on most skin types. The premium fragrance develops beautifully throughout the day, with its base notes of oud and amber creating a lasting impression that may remain on clothing for days. For maximum longevity, apply to pulse points on moisturized skin. ðŸŒ¸

Experience the captivating allure of Nahar Eau Du Parfum - where tradition meets modern luxury in a bottle of pure olfactory artistry. ðŸ’«
short_description: Nahar Eau Du Parfum blends vibrant bergamot and saffron with intoxicating rose and jasmine, settling into a luxurious base of oud, amber, and musk. This captivating oriental fragrance offers exceptional longevity and sillage, perfect for those who appreciate sophisticated Arabic perfumery.
